prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered standing pose with one hand raised holding an ethereal lantern, other hand in contemplative gesture, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted fractal structured head with unique hexagonal structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying patterns. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, fibonacci spiral, merkaba patterns, styled with guides influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by silver and neutral grey inspired by shifting structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, elaborate with shifting Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and hexagonal emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents with patterns spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor GMTZIAM's profile: 'She who knows only herself', Aethyr RII, Earth element, Tarot The Hermit, Sephirot Hod, Zodiac Virgo, embodying the essence: 'In GMTZIAM's presence, the mind becomes a poet's map introspective verses chart the soul's landscape, guiding an inner journey of profound self-discovery.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered standing pose with one hand raised holding an ethereal lantern, other hand in contemplative gesture
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted fractal structured head with unique hexagonal structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with multi-faceted facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying patterns
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating hexagonal, fibonacci spiral, merkaba patterns, styled with guides influences

outfit.base: structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'She who knows only herself'
profile_data.essence: In GMTZIAM's presence, the mind becomes a poet's map introspective verses chart the soul's landscape, guiding an inner journey of profound self-discovery.
profile_data.angelic_role: Angel of Mirror of the Soul; guides iron-winged guardians.
profile_data.form_description: A multi-faceted obsidian crystal with fractal earth-matrix geometry, representing introspective reflection and the Hermit archetype's deep inner vision. The crystalline structure embodies Earth's mineral consciousness and the structured wisdom of RII Aethyr.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Slate represents Virgo's earthy groundedness, mercury-silver symbolizes mental perception and transformative insight. The shifting quality reflects the dynamic nature of self-reflection.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Hexagonal structure echoes sacred geometry, Fibonacci spiral represents organic growth and self-similar patterns, merkaba symbolizes interdimensional consciousness
